metadata.dc:title: Health care for prisoners with mental heatlh problems in Holland
metadata.dc:description: In this study, a general picture is given of prisoners needing health care as a result of mental disorder and who, for this reason,have been interned in special care units with different security levels. Prisoners with mental disorders are an important factorin prisons in Holland. Services currently available for this type of inmate set out to offer the best care and support possible (AU)

Los presos con trastornospsíquicos son un factor importante en las instituciones penitenciarias en Holanda. Los servicios que existen actualmente paraesos presos intentan ofrecer la mayor atención y apoyo posibles (AU)
